p: Considering only very poor mobilizers (CD34+ count ≤ 10/µl), 7 out of 15 patients (47%) in the pre-plerixafor period and 33/40 patients (83%) in the plerixafor period proceeded to transplantation ( p = 0.02). Again, there was no difference between platelet/neutrophil engraftment rates and time to engraftment in those patients proceeding to transplantation (Table 5).
